attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Develop or give funding for research into more hydroelectric powerstations throughout the United Kingdom.  The country needs to develop its renewable energy sources and while the project may need to be on a major scale i.e. in terms of cost, the long term benefits would be incalculable.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
